data.title: Legal Notice
data.meta_description: Legal notice for the RATP Dev site Welcome to the website www.ratpdev.com. By using this site you acknowledge that you have read this notice and undertake to comply with it.  This legal notice is intended primarily to inform you of the intellectual property rights which must be obeyed along with the conditions for collecting and processing information about you as part of the implementation of this website. The contents of this notice may be amended. We therefore request that you consult it regularly.
data.text:
Legal notice for the RATP Dev site

Welcome to the website www.ratpdev.com. By using this site you acknowledge that you have read this notice and undertake to comply with it.

This legal notice is intended primarily to inform you of the intellectual property rights which must be obeyed along with the conditions for collecting and processing information about you as part of the implementation of this website. The contents of this notice may be amended. We therefore request that you consult it regularly.

The website RATP Dev

The site offers information about the Ratp Développement company and its subsidiaries.

The site is the property of RATP DEVELOPPEMENT, a joint stock company [société anonyme] with management and supervisory boards, registered equity €347.300.852,76, listed in the Paris Trade and Companies Register under No. 389 795 006

Head office: 54 quai de la Rapée, 75012 Paris

EU VAT No. FR75389795006

All correspondence may be sent to the following address: ratpdev.communication@ratpdev.com

Realization and development :

Atixnet (SAS) whose head office is located at 2bis avenue Foch, 94160 SAINT MANDE, Créteil Corporate & Trade Register Identification No : 443 452 503 and NAF code 6202A. It is represented by Mr Guillaume TOTOT, acting as Managing Director.

Protected rights

The items comprising the site and developed by Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries or on their behalf (and herein after referred to as “Contents”) are protected by current legislation with regard to copyright, registered trade marks and rights over drawings, models and unfair competition.

Contents include, among others, the architecture, style guides and graphic guidelines (including colours, fonts and graphic organisation of screens) and all information and items available on the Internet site such as text, articles, photographs, illustrations, images, brands and logos, data, databases and all audio items (voice, music, sound effects) and video items, both still and animated (such as graphic animations and audio-visual sequences), specific software developments and downloadable programs.

Contents are the property of Ratp Dev and of its subsidiaries or technical service providers.

Any and all reproduction, representation, broadcasting and/or usage of all or parts of the Contents by any means, in any format or for any purpose whatsoever is prohibited without prior formal and written authorisation from Ratp Dev. In all events, subject to the measures above, the source (this site and Ratp Dev and/or its subsidiaries) must be stipulated along with the name of the author where applicable.

Any person failing to comply with the legal provisions in effect may be liable for counterfeiting charges and for criminal penalties stipulated by law, notwithstanding all other means of recourse available to Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries.

Photo credits

Agence audiovisuelle RATP

54, quai de la Rapée

75599 PARIS CEDEX 12

(Gilles Aligon, Charles Ardaillon, Jean-Marie Carrier, Bertrand Chabrol, Noam Cilirie, Gérard Dumax, Didier Dupuy, Gilbert Gaillard, Didier Jackson, Bruno Marguerite, Jean-François Mauboussin, René Minoli, René Roy, Denis Sutton, Joël Thibault, Eric Touzé)

Liability

Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries do not make any guarantee whatsoever with regard to the Contents and in particular any guarantee of relevance for specific usage, property or lack of counterfeiting. Furthermore, Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries shall not be liable in any way whatsoever for direct or indirect damage, accessory or incidental damage, loss of data or of earnings as a result of or arising from the use or operation of this site and the Contents.

In addition, the site may contain inaccuracies or typographic errors.

Changes and updates are regularly implemented in this site. Accordingly, Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries reserve the right to implement any modification, rectification or change at any time.

This site contains links that allow you to leave the site. The said links are provided for your ease only and do not infer any approval or endorsement of the said sites by Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries. The target sites are not under any control by Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries, which are not in any way liable for the content of the said sites, the links they contain, the products or services they offer or any changes or updates made thereto.

Trade marks, names of products or services, domain names and the names of companies referred to in this site are the property of their respective owners.

Reference to links or trade names, names, services, domain names and names of other companies does not infer in any way any association between Ratp Dev and its subsidiaries and the said companies, products or serves, trade names and company names in question.

Privacy measures – collection and usage of personal data

Ratp Dev does not demand the disclosure of personal information (name, address, e-mail address, profession, etc.) at any time by site users. However and in particular to obtain specific information or receive documentation, you may be requested to register by providing specific items of personal information.

Ratp Dev hereby informs you that the personal data you may disclose on line for this purpose shall be used solely by Ratp Dev, which is responsible for processing and storing said information. The data will not be disclosed to third parties other than the third party hosting the site or intervening with regard to content or management of such. Said third parties are bound to comply with the confidentiality of the data and are forbidden from using them under any circumstances other than for the operation or management of the site.

Ratp Dev undertakes to take all reasonable measures available to it to preserve the confidentiality of personal information.

Accordingly, Ratp Dev hereby informs you that as per CNIL deliberation No. 2006-138 dated 9 May 2006 on exemptions for declaring processing for information and external communication purposes, the database which may include personal information fully complies with the framework laid down n the said deliberation, which therefore exempts Ratp Dev from filing with the CNIL. Nevertheless, Ratp Dev would like to remind you that as per French law dated 6 January 1978 concerning information technology, files and personal freedom (amended), you may avail yourself of the right to apply, access and rectify said personal data. You may exercise this right at any time by writing to:

RATP Dev

54 Quai de la Rapée - LAC LA 30

75012 Paris

ratpdev.communication@ratpdev.com

Modification or deletion will occur as soon as possible and no later than eight working days with effect of receipt of your request.

Ratp Dev would like to draw your attention to the fact that some items of information not equated with personal data and which cannot be used to identify you (web browser used, IP address, etc.) may be stored by our servers.

Furthermore, connection to our web server may result in the transfer to your browser of a small amount of information which is stored on your computer’s hard disk. This information – a “cookie” = stores information about you computer’s browsing of our site (the pages your viewed, the date and time of viewing, etc.) which we can read when you next visit.

Your browser features a function that allows you to refuse cookies (conditions stipulated on the website of the CNIL). Rejecting cookies will not prevent you from connecting to our site, but may make page loading slower.
